participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.background: I like photography. I like to garden. I am a chef. I love traveling.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.background: I just started college. I work part time in the campus library. I am living at home but hope to live in the dorms next year. I have 3 science classes.

content.text: Nice to meet you, participant_1. What do you do for fun?
I just started college, so I'm pretty busy with my classes. But I like to work part-time in the campus library and I hope to live in the dorms next year.
That sounds exciting! I'm a chef, so I'm always on the go. But I love to travel and I like to garden.
That's great! I love to cook, but I'm not very good at it. I've never gardened before, but I've always wanted to try.
You should! It's a lot of fun and you can grow your own food.
I'll have to try it sometime. So, what's your favorite thing about college so far?
I love learning new things and meeting new people. And I love the freedom to choose my own classes.
That's what I'm looking forward to the most. I'm excited to learn more about my chosen field and meet new people.
I'm sure you'll do great. You seem like a smart and motivated person.
Thank you! I'm trying my best.
Well, I have to go now. It was nice talking to you, participant_1.
You too! Have a nice day.
